meanings.definition: A virtual space on the internet where users can communicate with each other in real-time.
meanings.sent1: In chatrooms, people talk to each other online instantly.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy spending time in chatrooms chatting with friends from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The chatroom was so busy that it felt like a crowded virtual party.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a bustling chatroom, filled with thoughts and ideas bouncing around.
meanings.sent5: The chatroom buzzed with excitement as users shared stories and jokes.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in online conversations with others in a chatroom.
meanings.sent1: Chatrooms allow for easy communication between people on the internet.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours engaged in chatrooms discussing various topics with strangers.
meanings.sent3: His love for chatrooms was so strong that he even dreamed of chatting with emojis.
meanings.sent4: The chatroom experience was like diving into a sea of endless conversations.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of meeting new people in chatrooms kept her coming back for more.
